com.github.upthewaterspout.fates.core.threading.harness

Class ErrorCapturingExplorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.upthewaterspout.fates.core.threading.harness.ErrorCapturingExplorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decider, StateExplorer

    public class ErrorCapturingExplorer
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateExplorer
    A state explorer that captures errors and saves them for the done method. There are some valid errors that an explorer can through due to problems with the user's test. However, if those errors are thrown in the middle of instrumentation of things like wait and notify, it can result in a hang. Instead, save the errors for the end of the test execution.

        public void done()
        Description copied from interface: StateExplorer

        public <K> K decide(java.util.Set<K> options)
        Description copied from interface: Decider
